entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
